name: Awesome Sweet Cream Cupcake Dessert Maker
name_original: Awesome Sweet Cream Cupcake Dessert Maker
description:
Baking cupcakes has never been this easy! Awesome Sweet Cream Cupcake Dessert Maker is the perfect cooking game that is fun for all ages!

[Features]
-Dozens of DELICIOUS flavors to choose for your cupcakes!
-Create your own batter from scratch by mixing ingredients!
-Set the timer & let it bake!
-Decorate your cupcake with icing, candies, & more!
-Decorations include: creams, icing, frosting, sprinkles, candies & so much more!

Download today and start creating your tasty treats now!





[Note]
-This game is free to play but offers in-app purchases made with real money.
